ThingDef.label: area generator
ThingDef.description: This building is used to generate the MiningCo. area and the no roof area over the outpost so the whole area is not roofed once the laser fences are all switched on. It will remove itself once this is performed. This is a necessary trick as: - we cannot create a new Area during map generation (fails to create a new color). - the noRoofGrid is not yet initialized during map generation.
